00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <rpc/rpc.h>
00021 #include "nfsproto.h"
00022 #include "admproto.h"
00023 #include "cfs.h"
00024 
00025 cipher(k,s,d)
00026      cfskey *k;
00027      unsigned char *s;
00028      int d; /* "decrypting" flag */
00029 {
00030         d=d&1;
00031         switch (k->cipher) {
00032             case STD_DES:
00033                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des.primary,s,d);
00034                 break;
00035             case THREE_DES:
00036                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des3.primary1,s,d);
00037                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des3.primary2,s,1-d);
00038                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des3.primary1,s,d);
00039                 break;
00040             case TRUE_THREE_DES:
00041                 if (d) {
00042                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.primary3,s,1);
00043                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.primary2,s,1);
00044                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.primary1,s,1);
00045                 } else {
00046                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.primary1,s,0);
00047                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.primary2,s,0);
00048                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.primary3,s,0);
00049                 }
00050                 break;
00051             case MCG:
00052                 if (d)
00053                         mcg_block_decrypt(s,&k->var.mcg.primary);
00054                 else
00055                         mcg_block_encrypt(s,&k->var.mcg.primary);
00056                 break;
00057             case BLOWFISH:
00058                 if (d)
00059                         BF_encrypt(s,&k->var.bf.primary,BF_DECRYPT);
00060                 else
00061                         BF_encrypt(s,&k->var.bf.primary,BF_ENCRYPT);
00062                 break;
00063             case SAFER_SK128:
00064                 if (d)
00065                         Safer_Decrypt_Block(s,k->var.safer.primary,s);
00066                 else
00067                         Safer_Encrypt_Block(s,k->var.safer.primary,s);
00068             default:    /* just does nothing */
00069                 break;
00070         }
00071 }
00072 
00073 mask_cipher(k,s,d)
00074      cfskey *k;
00075      unsigned char *s;
00076      int d;
00077 {
00078         d=d&1;
00079         switch (k->cipher) {
00080             case STD_DES:
00081                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des.secondary,s,d);
00082                 break;
00083             case THREE_DES:
00084                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des3.secondary1,s,d);
00085                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des3.secondary2,s,1-d);
00086                 des_block_cipher(k->var.des3.secondary1,s,d);
00087                 break;
00088             case TRUE_THREE_DES:
00089                 if (d) {
00090                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.secondary3,s,1);
00091                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.secondary2,s,1);
00092                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.secondary1,s,1);
00093                 } else {
00094                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.secondary1,s,0);
00095                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.secondary2,s,0);
00096                         des_block_cipher(k->var.dest3.secondary3,s,0);
00097                 }
00098                 break;
00099             case MCG:
00100                 if (d)
00101                         mcg_block_decrypt(s,&k->var.mcg.secondary);
00102                 else
00103                         mcg_block_encrypt(s,&k->var.mcg.secondary);
00104                 break;
00105             case BLOWFISH:
00106                 if (d)
00107                         BF_encrypt(s,&k->var.bf.secondary,BF_DECRYPT);
00108                 else
00109                         BF_encrypt(s,&k->var.bf.secondary,BF_ENCRYPT);
00110                 break;
00111             case SAFER_SK128:
00112                 if (d)
00113                         Safer_Decrypt_Block(s,k->var.safer.secondary,s);
00114                 else
00115                         Safer_Encrypt_Block(s,k->var.safer.secondary,s);
00116             default:    /* just does nothing */
00117                 break;
00118         }
00119 }

00122 
00123 copykey(key,k)
00124      cfs_admkey *key;
00125      cfskey *k;
00126 {
00127         switch (key->cipher) {
00128             case CFS_STD_DES:
00129                 k->cipher=STD_DES;
00130                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,
00131                       k->var.des.primary);
00132                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,
00133                       k->var.des.secondary);
00134                 break;
00135             case CFS_THREE_DES:
00136                 k->cipher=THREE_DES;
00137                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,
00138                       k->var.des3.primary1);
00139                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,
00140                       k->var.des3.primary2);
00141                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary1,
00142                       k->var.des3.secondary1);
00143                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary2,
00144                       k->var.des3.secondary2);
00145                 break;
00146             case CFS_TRUE_THREE_DES:
00147                 k->cipher=TRUE_THREE_DES;
00148                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,
00149                       k->var.dest3.primary1);
00150                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,
00151                       k->var.dest3.primary2);
00152                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,
00153                       k->var.dest3.primary3);
00154                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary1,
00155                       k->var.dest3.secondary1);
00156                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary2,
00157                       k->var.dest3.secondary2);
00158                 des_key_setup(key->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary3,
00159                       k->var.dest3.secondary3);
00160                 break;
00161             case CFS_MACGUFFIN:
00162                 k->cipher=MCG;
00163                 mcg_keyset(key->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary,
00164                            &k->var.mcg.primary);
00165                 mcg_keyset(key->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.secondary,
00166                            &k->var.mcg.secondary);
00167                 break;
00168             case CFS_BLOWFISH:
00169                 k->cipher=BLOWFISH;
00170                 BF_set_key(&k->var.bf.primary,16,
00171                            key->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary);
00172                 BF_set_key(&k->var.bf.secondary,16,
00173                            key->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.secondary);
00174                 break;
00175             case CFS_SAFER_SK128:
00176                 k->cipher=SAFER_SK128;
00177                 Safer_Init_Module();
00178                 Safer_Expand_Userkey(key->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary,
00179                                      &(key->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary[8]),
00180                                      SAFER_SK128_DEFAULT_NOF_ROUNDS,
00181                                      1, /* for SK128 */
00182                                      k->var.safer.primary);
00183                 Safer_Expand_Userkey(key->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.secondary,
00184                                      &(key->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.secondary[8]),
00185                                      SAFER_SK128_DEFAULT_NOF_ROUNDS,
00186                                      1, /* for SK128 */
00187                                      k->var.safer.secondary);
00188             default:
00189                 break;
00190         }
00191 }
